mapper.sql: change_id, dept_id, change_type, old_superior_id, now_superior_id, orgnize_name, orgnize_code, change_date, file_number, ebl_flag, del_flag, order_num, description, create_time, create_userid, create_username, update_time, update_userid, update_username, version
mapper.insert: insert into tab_pb_orgnize_change (change_id, dept_id, change_type, old_superior_id, now_superior_id, orgnize_name, orgnize_code, change_date, file_number, ebl_flag, del_flag, order_num, description, create_time, create_userid, create_username, update_time, update_userid, update_username, version, change_reason ) values (#{changeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{changeType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{oldSuperiorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nowSuperiorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgnizeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgnizeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eblFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{changeReason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update tab_pb_orgnize_change
dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
change_type = #{changeType,jdbcType=BIGINT},
old_superior_id = #{oldSuperiorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
now_superior_id = #{nowSuperiorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
orgnize_name = #{orgnizeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orgnize_code = #{orgnizeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
change_date = #{changeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
file_number = #{fileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ebl_flag = #{eblFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_username = #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_userid = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_username = #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
change_reason = #{changeReason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where change_id = #{changeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tab_pb_orgnize_change set dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, change_type = #{changeType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, old_superior_id = #{oldSuperiorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now_superior_id = #{nowSuperiorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, orgnize_name = #{orgnizeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgnize_code = #{orgnizeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_date = #{changeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, file_number = #{fileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ebl_flag = #{eblFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_username = #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_userid = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_username = #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, change_reason = #{changeReason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where change_id = #{changeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tab_pb_orgnize_change set dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, change_type = #{changeType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, old_superior_id = #{oldSuperiorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now_superior_id = #{nowSuperiorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, orgnize_name = #{orgnizeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgnize_code = #{orgnizeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_date = #{changeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, file_number = #{fileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ebl_flag = #{eblFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_username = #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_userid = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_username = #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT} where change_id = #{changeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.change_id, t.dept_id, d.`name` AS orgnize_name, d.org_short_name AS short_name, (select `name` from sys_dept where dept_id = t.now_superior_id) now_superior_name, t.change_type, t.change_date, t.file_number, t.create_username, t.description, t.change_reason FROM tab_pb_orgnize_change t JOIN sys_dept d ON t.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE t.del_flag = 0 AND t.change_type != 59424 and t.dept_id = #{deptId} UNION select ch.change_id, ch.dept_id, up.upgrade_dept_name AS `name`, up.upgrade_short_name AS short_name, (select `name` from sys_dept where dept_id = ch.now_superior_id) now_superior_name, ch.change_type, ch.change_date, ch.file_number, up.create_username, ch.description, ch.change_reason from sys_dept_upgrade_temp up LEFT JOIN tab_pb_orgnize_change ch ON up.dept_id = ch.dept_id AND ch.change_type = 59424 AND ch.del_flag = 0 where up.del_flag = 0 and ch.dept_id = #{deptId}) a order by change_date asc
